x86x64::RegMaskÂ¶

struct asmjit::x86x64::RegMask
#include <x86defs.h>

X86/X64 registers mask (Gp, Fp, Mm, Xmm/Ymm/Zmm).

Public Functions

void zero(uint32_t c)

uint32_t get(uint32_t c)

void set(uint32_t c, uint32_t mask)

void set(const RegMask & other)

void add(uint32_t c, uint32_t mask)

void add(const RegMask & other)

void del(uint32_t c, uint32_t mask)

void del(const RegMask & other)

void and_(uint32_t c, uint32_t mask)

void and_(const RegMask & other)

void xor_(uint32_t c, uint32_t mask)

void xor_(const RegMask & other)

bool isEmpty()

bool has(uint32_t c, uint32_t mask = 0xFFFFFFFF)

void reset()

Public Members

uint16_t _gp

Gp registers mask.

uint16_t _fp

Fp registers mask.

uint16_t _mm

Mm registers mask.

uint16_t _xy

Xmm/Ymm registers mask.

uint16_t _regs[4]

UInt64 _packed

All masks as 64-bit integer.
